Title: Day 6: 11:00 A.M. - 12:00 P.M.
Plot: Jack forces Graem to take him to McCarthy's office in the hopes of finding a lead to their father's whereabouts. Lennox plays a trump card that removes Karen from his path as he prepares to implement more extreme policies. The FBI's sting operation with Walid goes terribly awry, while Nadia finds herself impeded by new security measures at CTU.
GuestStars: Scott William Winters,  David Hunt,  Steve Wastell,  Jim Klock,  Haaz Sleiman,  Al Faris,  Missy Crider,  Paul McCrane,  James Cromwell
